title: Reading the Question
text: The probability question asks for the probability that eight of the players will be boys. Remember that the group of interest doesn't focus on the broader sample or the formation of a committee, but rather the smaller group that we want to check the probability of out of a larger group.

title: Determining the Group of Interest
text: Knowing that the probability question asks for the probability that eight of the players will be boys, what is the group of interest?
